alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 11 at 4:15AM EST until March 12 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...West Carteret and East Carteret Counties, and Northern Outer Banks, Ocracoke Island and Hatteras Island. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: East Carteret; Hatteras Island; Northern Outer Banks; Ocracoke Island; West Carteret
